wtsproc.config: Vehicle equipped with transmission mounted PTO and pump.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood assembly.
Drain air tank if applicable.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Drain automatic transmission assembly fluid.
Remove drive shaft behind transmission, support second shaft.
Remove passenger seat assembly, include disconnect air line if applicable.
Remove door sill trim from right door opening.
Position cab floor mat for access to floor pan.
Remove cab floor pan.
Remove rear transmission support bar through floor pan opening.
Disconnect PTO pump hose p-clips from brackets if applicable.
Remove PTO pump bracket if applicable.
Remove PTO pump from PTO if applicable.
Disconnect wiring as needed to remove transmission, include cut tie straps and secure harness.
Disconnect oil filler tube from transmission, include remove p-clip(s) and secure out of way.
Disconnect oil cooler lines, include p-clip bracket. Cap ends.
Disconnect starter wiring and remove starter motor assembly.

note.para: Step performed for access to converter bolt inspection plate.

step1.para: Remove flywheel inspection plate.
Remove converter assembly bolts.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine except two.
Install jack to transmission and secure.
Remove remaining bolts retaining transmission to engine. Remove transmission.
Install transmission assembly.

note.para: Insure torque converter is fully seated into pump.

step1.para: Install bolts retaining transmission to engine, include install p-clip bracket.
Remove jack from transmission.
Install any remaining bolts retaining transmission to engine and torque to spec.
Install converter assembly bolts and torque to spec.
Install flywheel inspection plate.
Install starter motor assembly and connect starter wiring.
Connect oil cooler lines, include p-clip bracket to bellhousing.
Connect oil filler tube to transmission, include p-clips.
Install rear transmission support bar through floor pan opening.

note.para: Insure transmission wiring harness is above support bar.

step1.para: Connect wiring to transmission, include install tie straps as needed.
Install PTO pump to PTO if applicable.
Install PTO pump bracket if applicable.
Connect PTO pump hose p-clips to brackets if applicable.
Install cab floor pan.
Place cab floor mat into original position.
Install right door sill trim.
Install seat assembly, include connect air line if applicable.
Install drive shaft behind transmission, connect second shaft.
Fill automatic transmission assembly fluid.
Connect battery to ground cable, include connect ECM ground.
Start engine, check for leaks and top off fluids as needed.
Close hood assembly and remove wheel chocks.
